Celestial Object.Name: 1FGL J0522.8-3632
Celestial Object.Type: BL Lac object (previously N galaxy and Seyfert 1 galaxy)

References: Lambert et al. 2009, A&A, 493, 317; Abdo et al. 2010, ApJS, 188, 405; Ulrich 1981, A&A, 103, L1; Scarpa et al. 1995, A&A, 303, 730
Observatory: international collaboration between NASA and DOE in the U.S. and many scientific institutions across France, Italy, Japan and Sweden
